question: Which Indian bank has launched contactless ‘RuPay Select’ debit card in association with NPCI?
explanation:
Central Bank of India has recently launched contactless 'RuPay Select' debit card in association with the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI).
Through this card, the users can avail membership and access to golf courses, gyms, spas and restaurants. The users can also avail discounted health check-ups with the National Common Mobility Debit Card (NCMC).
